00009 unsigned AdcBlock::getElecChannel(int i) const {
00010 
00011   //int ipos = 3 + i/2;
00012   //unsigned mod = (unsigned) fmod( (float) i, 2);
00013   unsigned boardID = (unsigned) getIntVal(0) ;
00014   unsigned Fe = (unsigned) getIntVal(2) ;
00015   unsigned Imul = (unsigned) getIntVal(3) ;
00016   
00017   //Need to do some bit masking since boardID contains also
00018   //Values like CRC Component
00019   unsigned elec_channel = ( ( (boardID<<8) & 0xffff0000) | (Fe<<12) | ( Imul << 4 ) | (i << 0) );
00020   return elec_channel;
00021 }
00022

00024 void AdcBlock::print(  std::ostream& os, int i ){
00025 
00026   os << " elec_channel: ["  << std::hex  << getElecChannel(i) << "]" <<  std::dec 
00027      << ", cellID: " <<  getAdcVal(i) 
00028      << std::endl ;
00029   
00030 }
00031 
00032 }
